long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peak Vault is a wallet for the Hive blockchain. It allows users to securely store their private keys and interact with the blockchain in a simple way and intuitive way. Send, stake, swap or delegate tokens. Keep track of your balances and your NFTs.
